page.title: 10Electricity Supply.
page.content: The electricity is sent from power-stations at Longannet and Kincardine on overhead cables to a station west of the D.C.L Bottling Plant on the Windygates road (A-915). From there it goes to the Durie House distribution centre. The centre is east of Durie House and north of the Glen.The electricity is sent into the centre at 33,000 volts.It gives out elictricity in and around Leven and the neighbouring farms.It is stepped down to 240 volts for houses,schools and factories.It is sent to the farms on overhead cables on wooden poles.It is also sent to the town of Leven through underground cables.
